meanings.definition: The act or process of decorating.
meanings.sent1: She enjoyed the decoration of her room with colorful posters.
meanings.sent2: The decoration of the cake with icing made it look beautiful.
meanings.sent3: The decoration of the dog with a tiny hat was a funny sight.
meanings.sent4: The decoration of the garden with fairy lights transformed it into a magical wonderland.
meanings.sent5: The decoration of the classroom with student artwork brightened up the walls.

meanings.sent1: The flowers were a lovely decoration on the table.
meanings.sent2: She bought new decorations for the Christmas tree.
meanings.sent3: The decoration of the cake with too many candles was a mistake.
meanings.sent4: The decoration of the room with vintage furniture gave it a cozy feel.
meanings.sent5: The decoration of the gift box with a bow made it look special.

meanings.definition: An award or badge of honor.
meanings.sent1: Receiving the medal was a great decoration for his bravery.
meanings.sent2: The decoration on his uniform showed his rank in the army.
meanings.sent3: The decoration of the certificate with glitter made it stand out.
meanings.sent4: The decoration of the trophy with gold accents made it shine.
meanings.sent5: The decoration of the plaque with his name engraved was a proud moment.
